Staff, very rare (requires attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)
Sturdy and smooth, this impressive staff is crafted from solid stone. Most stone staves are crafted by dwarf mages and few ever find their way into non-dwarven hands. The staff can be wielded as a magic quarterstaff that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it.
The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC and spellcasting ability: @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPearthskimmer00]{earthskimmer} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPentomb00000000]{entomb} (6 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.MQ0Mglo6Zc2AoHem]{flesh to stone} (6 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.SDXJbySSsm9mhMfl]{meld into stone} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.1VMSLD8d4J34E3bs]{stone shape} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.hg7Ruezml76s0iWB]{stoneskin} (4 charges), or @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.AfDzCryw6wPhIoab]{wall of stone} (5 charges). You can also use an action to cast the @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl-bf.koboldpressspells.Item.KPpummelstone000]{pummelstone} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.mGGlcLdggHwcL7MG]{true strike} spell from the staff without using any charges.
The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, hundreds of cracks appear across the staff â€™s surface and it crumbles into tiny bits of stone.
